title: Immediate Move-In Available!! One Bed One Bath With Central AC
posting_body: Up to 8 weeks free on select homes.
Contact our leasing office for details.
BRAND NEW LUXURY APARTMENTS IN KIRKLAND

Thoughtfully designed floor plans, sleek modern finishes, and smart home technology come together to create a blueprint for effortless living within the center of a vibrant new village in Kirkland, WA.
Welcome home to our spacious Studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments at Aspect at Totem Lake.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 660 Sq.
- Wood-style Plank Flooring in the Living Areas
- Kitchen Island with Decorative Pendant Lighting*
- Game Area with Arcade Games, Pool Table, and Foosball Table
- Minutes from the Totem Lake Transit Center
- Hub by Amazon: Package Lockers with 24/7 Access to Packages
- Located in The Village at Totem Lake Putting High End Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment at your Doorstep
Please contact us for more details.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
